name: Joe Aguado
bio: Combining his experience in the financial industry with his management roles in business administration, Joe Aguado brings a business-focused approach to the Technology space. Proficient in both front and back-end development Joe is able to combine his various skillsets to bridge the gap between business strategy and technological implementation. His primary objective will always remain to deliver innovative solutions for modern challenges.

name: Christine Hoang
bio: Christine Hoang is a versatile professional adept at juggling roles as a Full Stack Developer and Product Manager. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to quality assurance, they ensure that every project meets the highest standards. Known for their empathetic leadership style, Christine leads her teams with kindness and compassion, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone can thrive.
